siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, This is our 150th episode! We take a look back at how the podcast started, what we set out to accomplish, and some fun moments along the way. Grab your favorite milkshake and reminisce with us about Life with a Twist fo Lemon. Stan Lemon & Jon Kohlmeier

Stan with Milkshake Poptarts Dear Listener, Stan got a milkshake from Red Robin this week. It went about how you’d expect it to go. We also hit on some other things around Red Robin. We also discovered that there is a Strawberry Milkshake flavored Pop-Tart. Stay tuned for reviews…

frontmatter.title: Episode 26 - Starting 2019 and Looking Back on 2018
